titles.title: If ye then be risen with Christ

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
If ye then be risen with Christ
Seek those things which are above
Set your affections on things on high
And not on earth;
For ye are dead, and your life is hid
In Christ Who is our God,
When He shall appear we shall appear with Him in glory.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We'll be glorified, we'll be glorified,
When He shall appear we shall appear with Him in glory.
